questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Two electric scooter
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A parking area for scooters
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) People walking
B) Trees and plants
C) Birds flying
D) Electric scooters

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bench
C) Two electric scooters
D) A car

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A concrete path
B) A flower garden
C) A picnic table
D) A playground

What is the relationship between the electric scooters and the metal racks?
A) The scooters are locked to the racks
B) The racks are for bikes only
C) The scooters are parked next to the racks
D) The racks are part of a playground

What brand are the electric scooters?
A) Lime
B) Bird
C) Spin
D) Lyft

What kind of surface are the scooters parked on?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Concrete
D) Wood

What is the primary color of the electric scooters?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) Silver

What is the condition of the ground in the background?
A) Covered with snow
B) Paved with bricks
C) Grassy
D) Sandy

What type of fencing is seen in the background?
A) Wooden
B) Chain-link
C) Stone
D) Barbed wire

What can be seen beyond the fence in the background?
A) A playground
B) A parking lot with cars
C) A pond
D) A forest

What is the orientation of the electric scooters?
A) Facing each other
B) Back to back
C) Side by side
D) Diagonally placed

How many electric scooters are there in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

Are there any people visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the state of the grass in the background?
A) Overgrown and wild
B) Well-maintained and short
C) Brown and dry
D) Covered in flowers

What is the primary material of the scooters?
A) Plastic
B) Metal
C) Wood
D) Rubber

Are there any vehicles visible in the background?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the color of the text on the scooters?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White
D) Yellow

What is the design of the handlebars on the scooters?
A) Curved
B) Straight
C) Triangular
D) Circular

What type of tires do the scooters have?
A) Inflatable
B) Solid rubber
C) Wooden
D) Metal

What is the condition of the grass near the concrete surface?
A) Overgrown
B) Well-trimmed
C) Patchy and sparse
D) Covered in flowers

What is the orientation of the fence in the background?
A) Vertical
B) Horizontal
C) Diagonal
D) Curved
